title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: this board only turns on smc bypass mode, could you help me by telling me where to start measuring for this damage

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message:
Can you get it into macOS in SMC bypass?

There must be a problem related with some SMC sensor.
Ceck first AVREF_SMC voltage.

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message:
Can you get it into macOS in SMC bypass? yes
AVREF_SMC voltage=3.3v
when plugged in charger it restarts constant fan; without giving video.
just power on with video and enter system bypass mode and fan rotate normal

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message:
Strange, fan should spin to max in SMC bypass mode.

Check I/VSENSE sensors output on pages 49 & 50.
Run HWMonitor, if possible.

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message:
excuse me in bybass mode fan spin to max
these are measurements when board fan restarts constantly

SMC_PBUS_VSENSE=2.1 y baja 0 si se mantiene ciclicamente
SMC_DCIN_VSENSE=2.8 y baja 2.7 ciclo
SMC_CPU_VSENSE=1.16 y baja 0 ciclo
SMC_CPU_ISENSE=0v
SMC_GFX_VSENSE=0v
SMC_GFX_ISENSE=0v
SMC_CPUVCCIO_ISENSE=0v
SMC_CPU_HI_ISENSE=0.67 y baja 0.16 ciclo
SMC_BMON_ISENSE=0v
SMC_OTHER_HI_ISENSE=0.80 se mantiene asi ciclo
SMC_DCIN_ISENSE=0.30 se mantiene asi ciclo

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message:
Any history available?

You should try reballing SMC.

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: I already did smc reballing, this problem persists fan restarts constantly, ¿change the smc? no story available

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: change smc it worked fine for a while, then it didn't turn on again, it only turns on bypass mode but without video. It is possible that the battery is causing it or another component

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: Reflow it; be sure to get good solders.

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: I did reflow and it did not work, I am using solder paste and flux of not high quality. Do you think it has to do? do I reballing smc with a high quality solder paste?

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: If machine worked correctly after you've replaced SMC, then I suspect bad solders now.

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: ok, What brand of solder paste and flux do you use?

title: 820-2936 not turn on
message: I use quality flux, ECOFREC TF 49, but cheap chinese solder paste.
